name: Die Maker, Oh No I Don't Mean Like That, I Mean Like Dice But Singular. Sorry, I Wasn't Trying To Confuse You.
name_original: Die Maker, Oh No I Don't Mean Like That, I Mean Like Dice But Singular. Sorry, I Wasn't Trying To Confuse You.
description:
A small tool to let you make custom dice. I had travel complications so this was made in about 8 hours, but I hope you enjoy!

Its encouraged to take screenshots of your die if you want!

Any constructive criticism is encouraged!
